## Software requirements

- ShapeIT (v2.r837 was used)
- RFMix (v1.5.4 was used)

## Step 1: 

Run <code>setup.sh</code> on your tower and Rosie.

Create the directory data/input/genetic_map_hapmap on Rosie. 

Download http://www.shapeit.fr/files/genetic_map_b37.tar.gz. 

Unzip the files in there, and rename each of the files to chr\<nr\>.txt

## Step X: Create admixed phased file

### Run on tower

<code>bash merge_afr_am_bdos.sh</code>
Merge the African American and Barbados sample sets.

Copy ../data/input/afr_am_bdos* to the corresponding directory on Rosie.

### Run on Rosie

<code>bash run_shapeit.sh \<plink_file_prefix\> \<chr\></code>
Run ShapeIT by chromosome. The input PLINK file is the output merged file created above.
